member.name: IPrinting3DManagerInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Gets an Print3DManager object for the window of the active application.
member.param: Handle to the window of the active application.

param.name: riid
param.para: The GUID for the resource interface.
The REFIID, or GUID, of the interface to the resource can be obtained by using the __uuidof() macro. For example:

member.param: Address of a pointer to a Print3DManager object.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPrinting3DManagerInterop.ShowPrintUIForWindowAsync
member.summary: Programmatically initiates the 3D printing user interface.
member.param: Handle to the window of the active application.

param.name: riid
param.para: The GUID for the resource interface.
The REFIID, or GUID, of the interface to the resource can be obtained by using the __uuidof() macro. For example:

member.param: Address of a pointer to a IAsyncAction object that returns void upon completion.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPrinting3DManagerInterop
member.summary: Enables interoperability with a WinRT Print3DManager object.
